<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ClassID.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfobase/#a9b6bb9f6a9e81db4475a6e3c8705bf54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfobase/#a9b6bb9f6a9e81db4475a6e3c8705bf54">isA</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ClassID)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether this instance is a subclass of ErrorInfoT.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfobase/#a6ab5f499790cb038912aecec516bb29c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ErrorInfoT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfobase/#a6ab5f499790cb038912aecec516bb29c">isA</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Lightweight error class with error context and mandatory checking.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Instances of this class wrap a ErrorInfoBase pointer. Failure states</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are represented by setting the pointer to a ErrorInfoBase subclass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instance containing information describing the failure. Success is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// represented by a null pointer value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Instances of Error also contains a &#39;Checked&#39; flag, which must be set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// before the destructor is called, otherwise the destructor will trigger a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// runtime error. This enforces at runtime the requirement that all Error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instances be checked or returned to the caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There are two ways to set the checked flag, depending on what state the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Error instance is in. For Error instances indicating success, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is sufficient to invoke the boolean conversion operator. E.g.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Error foo(&lt;...&gt;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   if (auto E = foo(&lt;...&gt;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     return E; // &lt;- Return E if it is in the error state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // We have verified that E was in the success state. It can now be safely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // destroyed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A success value &#42;can not&#42; be dropped. For example, just calling &#39;foo(&lt;...&gt;)&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// without testing the return value will raise a runtime error, even if foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// returns success.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For Error instances representing failure, you must use either the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// handleErrors or handleAllErrors function with a typed handler. E.g.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   class MyErrorInfo : public ErrorInfo&lt;MyErrorInfo&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     // Custom error info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Error foo(&lt;...&gt;) &#123; return make&#95;error&lt;MyErrorInfo&gt;(...); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   auto E = foo(&lt;...&gt;); // &lt;- foo returns failure with MyErrorInfo.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   auto NewE =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     handleErrors(std::move(E),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#91;&#93;(const MyErrorInfo &amp;M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         // Deal with the error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#91;&#93;(std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;OtherError&gt; M) -&gt; Error &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         if (canHandle(&#42;M)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           // handle error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           return Error::success();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         // Couldn&#39;t handle this error instance. Pass it up the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         return Error(std::move(M));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // Note - The error passed to handleErrors will be marked as checked. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // there is no matched handler, a new error with the same payload is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // created and returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // The handlers take the error checked by handleErrors as an argument,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // which can be used to retrieve more information. If a new error is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // created by a handler, it will be passed back to the caller of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // handleErrors and needs to be checked or return up to the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // Otherwise, the passed-in error is considered consumed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The handleAllErrors function is identical to handleErrors, except</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that it has a void return type, and requires all errors to be handled and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// no new errors be returned. It prevents errors (assuming they can all be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// handled) from having to be bubbled all the way to the top-level.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42;All&#42; Error instances must be checked before destruction, even if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// they&#39;re moved-assigned or constructed from Success values that have already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// been checked. This enforces checking through all levels of the call stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ErrorList needs to be able to yank ErrorInfoBase pointers out of Errors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to add to the error list. It can&#39;t rely on handleErrors for this, since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// handleErrors does not support ErrorList handlers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#af9853a913f7c3209c5076a66ebdee623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#af9853a913f7c3209c5076a66ebdee623">ErrorList</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// handleErrors needs to be able to set the Checked flag.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... HandlerTs&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a2c831eabfe62504c9cc0cc16e0799c44">handleErrors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>, HandlerTs &amp;&amp;... Handlers);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// visitErrors needs direct access to the payload.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HandlerT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#ac1eaa283b96012bf2a0f2e05d04a952a">visitErrors</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>, HandlerT <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expected&lt;T&gt; needs to be able to steal the payload when constructed from an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a815f6718ecaf8321aab0587f5e62d048"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a815f6718ecaf8321aab0587f5e62d048">Expected</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wrap needs to be able to steal the payload.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcerror/#gad81d81a316ef38888533a24b786a6605">LLVMErrorRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/executionenginebindings-cpp/#a5fe4041db3281600b33fbb1bde23f0d2">wrap</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a success value. Prefer using &#39;Error::success()&#39; for readability</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setPtr(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setChecked(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a success value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorsuccess">ErrorSuccess</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aea6e51b13067f27d5b9bd39d1f44b670">success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Errors are not copy-constructable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#ab4f20eb017c74ffdac91daf5b5068a73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#ab4f20eb017c74ffdac91daf5b5068a73">Error</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Move-construct an error value. The newly constructed error is considered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// unchecked, even if the source error had been checked. The original error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// becomes a checked Success value, regardless of its original state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a1c1f5fe40e458b271781c97954d518b6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a1c1f5fe40e458b271781c97954d518b6">Error</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setChecked(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create an error value. Prefer using the &#39;make&#95;error&#39; function, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this constructor can be useful when &quot;re-throwing&quot; errors from handlers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a56f3ef0d501ed9a50b5f18075d97ca8d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a56f3ef0d501ed9a50b5f18075d97ca8d">Error</a>(std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;ErrorInfoBase&gt; Payload) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setPtr(Payload.release());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setChecked(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Errors are not copy-assignable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a6c4d13d802bccdfc5b40bb1a2447db3b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a6c4d13d802bccdfc5b40bb1a2447db3b">operator=</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Move-assign an error value. The current error must represent success, you</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// you cannot overwrite an unhandled error. The current error is then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// considered unchecked. The source error becomes a checked success value,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// regardless of its original state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#ae6cd5f6ac32dc47c9437c7315fb79444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#ae6cd5f6ac32dc47c9437c7315fb79444">operator=</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a7245b97586de88539c5dc656b6e7f38d">Error</a> &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t allow overwriting of unchecked values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    assertIsChecked();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setPtr(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.getPtr());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This Error is unchecked, even if the source error was checked.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setChecked(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Null out Other&#39;s payload and set its checked bit.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Tagged union holding either a T or a Error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class parallels ErrorOr, but replaces error&#95;code with Error. Since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Error cannot be copied, this class replaces getError() with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// takeError(). It also adds an bool errorIsA&lt;ErrT&gt;() method for testing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// error class type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Example usage of &#39;Expected&lt;T&gt;&#39; as a function return type:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     Expected&lt;int&gt; myDivide(int A, int B) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       if (B == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         // return an Error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         return createStringError(inconvertibleErrorCode(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                  &quot;B must not be zero!&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       // return an integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       return A / B;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Checking the results of to a function returning &#39;Expected&lt;T&gt;&#39;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     if (auto E = Result.takeError()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       // We must consume the error. Typically one of:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       // - return the error to our caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       // - toString(), when logging</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       // - consumeError(), to silently swallow the error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       // - handleErrors(), to distinguish error types</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       errs() &lt;&lt; &quot;Problem with division &quot; &lt;&lt; toString(std::move(E)) &lt;&lt; &quot;\\n&quot;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       return;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     // use the result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     outs() &lt;&lt; &quot;The answer is &quot; &lt;&lt; &#42;Result &lt;&lt; &quot;\\n&quot;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  For unit-testing a function returning an &#39;Expected&lt;T&gt;&#39;, see the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  &#39;EXPECT&#95;THAT&#95;EXPECTED&#39; macros in llvm/Testing/Support/Error.h</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected/#a815f6718ecaf8321aab0587f5e62d048">Expected</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected/#ab847dec75020c9483d18247c4e79828e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T1&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected/#ab847dec75020c9483d18247c4e79828e">ExpectedAsOutParameter</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected/#a815f6718ecaf8321aab0587f5e62d048"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OtherT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected/#a815f6718ecaf8321aab0587f5e62d048">Expected</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Report a fatal error if Err is a failure value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function can be used to wrap calls to fallible functions ONLY when it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is known that the Error will always be a success value. E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // foo only attempts the fallible operation if DoFallibleOperation is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // true. If DoFallibleOperation is false then foo always returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   // Error::success().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Error foo(bool DoFallibleOperation);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   cantFail(foo(false));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> Err, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Msg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Err) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Msg)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Report a fatal error if ValOrErr is a failure value, otherwise unwraps and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// returns the contained value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Expected&lt;int&gt; foo(bool DoFallibleOperation);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Report a fatal error if ValOrErr is a failure value, otherwise unwraps and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function can be used to wrap calls to fallible functions ONLY when it</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Handle any errors (if present) in an Expected&lt;T&gt;, then try a recovery path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the incoming value is a success value it is returned unmodified. If it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is a failure value then it the contained error is passed to handleErrors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If handleErrors is able to handle the error then the RecoveryPath functor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is called to supply the final result. If handleErrors is not able to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// handle all errors then the unhandled errors are returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This utility enables the follow pattern:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   enum FooStrategy &#123; Aggressive, Conservative &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Expected&lt;Foo&gt; foo(FooStrategy S);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   auto ResultOrErr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     handleExpected(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       foo(Aggressive),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#91;&#93;() &#123; return foo(Conservative); &#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#91;&#93;(AggressiveStrategyError&amp;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         // Implicitly conusme this - we&#39;ll recover by using a conservative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         // strategy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RecoveryFtor, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... HandlerTs&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a931eea16951e9531c3d3fdfbb9edc410"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;T&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a931eea16951e9531c3d3fdfbb9edc410">handleExpected</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;T&gt;</a> ValOrErr, RecoveryFtor &amp;&amp;RecoveryPath,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           HandlerTs &amp;&amp;... Handlers) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValOrErr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValOrErr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Err = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3285d0c2736154c3ea72dbecaa446eec">handleErrors</a>(ValOrErr.takeError(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper for converting an Error to a bool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This method returns true if Err is in an error state, or false if it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in a success state.  Puts Err in a checked state in both cases (unlike</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Error::operator bool(), which only does this for success states).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0596fb939ff753151c9c37ed2b671b4c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0596fb939ff753151c9c37ed2b671b4c">errorToBool</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> Err) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper for Errors used as out-parameters.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This helper is for use with the Error-as-out-parameter idiom, where an error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is passed to a function or method by reference, rather than being returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In such cases it is helpful to set the checked bit on entry to the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// so that the error can be written to (unchecked Errors abort on assignment)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and clear the checked bit on exit so that clients cannot accidentally forget</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to check the result. This helper performs these actions automatically using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RAII:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Result foo(Error &amp;Err) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     ErrorAsOutParameter ErrAsOutParam(&amp;Err); // &#39;Checked&#39; flag set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     // &lt;body of foo&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     // &lt;- &#39;Checked&#39; flag auto-cleared when ErrAsOutParam is destructed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ErrorAsOutParameter takes an Error&#42; rather than Error&amp; so that it can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// used with optional Errors (Error pointers that are allowed to be null). If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ErrorAsOutParameter took an Error reference, an instance would have to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// created inside every condition that verified that Error was non-null. By</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// taking an Error pointer we can just create one instance at the top of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorasoutparameter"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorasoutparameter/#a15601d16c2b77fe4bf989a7790ae1579">ErrorAsOutParameter</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorasoutparameter/#a15601d16c2b77fe4bf989a7790ae1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorasoutparameter/#a15601d16c2b77fe4bf989a7790ae1579">ErrorAsOutParameter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> &#42;Err) : Err(Err) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Raise the checked bit if Err is success.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Err)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)!!&#42;Err;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorasoutparameter/#a36c4da8f211c09de6c08c4f9f74e62ff"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorasoutparameter/#a36c4da8f211c09de6c08c4f9f74e62ff">ErrorAsOutParameter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> &amp;Err) : Err(&amp;Err) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void)!!Err;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorasoutparameter/#a765e53d971b833ce71bcf56164890eb4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorasoutparameter/#a765e53d971b833ce71bcf56164890eb4">~ErrorAsOutParameter</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear the checked bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Err &amp;&amp; !&#42;Err)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;Err = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper to get errno as an std::error&#95;code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// errno should always be represented using the generic category as that&#39;s what</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// both libc++ and libstdc++ do. On POSIX systems you can also represent them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// using the system category, however this makes them compare differently for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// values outside of those used by &#96;std::errc&#96; if one is generic and the other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is system.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// See the libc++ and libstdc++ implementations of &#96;default&#95;error&#95;condition&#96; on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the system category for more details on what the difference is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae075c94db10b09d6d5876d32219eaf0d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae075c94db10b09d6d5876d32219eaf0d">errnoAsErrorCode</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code(errno, std::generic&#95;category());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class wraps a string in an Error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// StringError is useful in cases where the client is not expected to be able</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to consume the specific error message programmatically (for example, if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// error message is to be presented to the user).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// StringError can also be used when additional information is to be printed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// along with a error&#95;code message. Depending on the constructor called, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// class can either display:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    1 the error&#95;code message (ECError behavior)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    2 a string</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    3 the error&#95;code message and a string</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// These behaviors are useful when subtyping is required; for example, when a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// specific library needs an explicit error type. In the example below,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PDBError is derived from StringError:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Expected&lt;int&gt; foo() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      return llvm::make&#95;error&lt;PDBError&gt;(pdb&#95;error&#95;code::dia&#95;failed&#95;loading,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                        &quot;Additional information&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringerror"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringerror/#a7ee2bc10d4c14bf5f9026f711f83f8f4">StringError</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfo">ErrorInfo</a>&lt;StringError&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
